name: GermOBlast
description:
Made by Om prakash Behera in Unity engine

Are you also bored in this Lockdown ? But from now for some time you wouldn't be bored, Because you can play my first FPS(First person shooter) "GermOBlast"

A game in which you need to help a patient "George" from those Green Germs.  

So, players are you ready, lets be Geogre's WBC cell and fight Germs.

Instructions:

1.Download the zip file(66.7 MB)

2.Open the zip file, close the pop-up(RAR license) if any

3.Click on the 2nd option Extract To📁 

4.Choose location as Desktop📂, Click on OK

5.Go to Desktop, Open the x86 File📂

6.Open the file named "New Unity Project"

  (Sorry,I forgot to change the project name before Exporting, Thus it got the    default "New Unity Project" name)          

 7.YOUR MOUSE WILL DISAPPEAR, AFTER SUCCESSFUL OPENING OF GAME.

8.Press Esc(Escape) to pause the game. A pause menu will appear like this 👇

 9.Scroll your mouse to change your weapon

10.Use:

  W key for Moving Front

  S key for Moving Back

  A key for Moving Left

  D key for Moving Right

11.Click to shoot

12.Shoot the Green Germs but Protect the Red cells (RBCs)

Thats the all important instructions

At a certain point you will find a locked door. You need to find a key then shoot at the door to move further.

End of this game is when you reach this point
